FlowOrchestrationStageInstance.name: FlowOrchestrationStageInstance
FlowOrchestrationStageInstance.description: Represents a run-time instance of a stage in a run-time instance of an orchestration.

Label.description: The label for the flow orchestration stage instance. This label helps users and administrators differentiate between step instances from the same orchestration.

Name.description: The API name for the flow orchestration stage instance.

OrchestrationInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowOrchestrationInstance associated with the orchestration stage instance.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the automated process user. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

Status.description: The run status of the orchestration stage instance. Valid values are: Completed—The stage instance completed. Discontinued—The stage was in progress or completed when the orchestration instance encountered an error. Error—The stage instance encountered an error, an instance of a background step within the stage encountered and error, or an autolaunched flow called by a background step within the stage encountered an error. InProgress—The stage instance is in progress. Suspended—The stage was in progress when the orchestration instance was manually suspended.
